Articles.Content:
So..i was messing around with the debug menu when this happened. ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

[http://imgur.com/gallery/3DN3r32/new](http://imgur.com/gallery/3DN3r32/new)

Ah, the age-old "phase through solid matter" ritual. It's the Kerbal way! ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
